Add new WebHook bot.

Label: WebHook:

This website allows you to have human controlled bots in your server.

Have the human controlled bots entertain your patrons and interact with them. Get started with just 3 simple steps. Make sure you have the rights on the server to add WebHooks.

All discord markdown is supported from WebHook bots.

Bugs and features can be reported on github. This website has no relation with discordapp.com.
